text: Masali kasone, ki ʙa çoji Alloh taolo dūstone [az sangu cūʙ va murdagonro ʙa unvoni şafoatgar] ʙaroi xud ʙarguzidaand, hamcun masali ankaʙut ast, ki xonai [ʙedavomro panohgohi xeş] ʙarguzidaast va ʙe tardid, susttarin xonaho xonai ankaʙut ast. Agar [muşrikon in haqiqatro] medonistand, [ʙuthoro ʙa parastiş namegiriftand]
